entry.title: Save Big On Aliens: Dark Descent Ahead Of Next Week's Launch
entry.content:
Aliens: Dark Descent launches next Tuesday, June 20, and if you're looking for a deal on preorders--Fanatical and Green Man Gaming are offering 18% off the game's PC edition (Steam key). You can preorder a Steam key for Aliens: Dark Descent for $32.79 ($40).

Aliens: Dark Descent features an original story set in the Aliens franchise, with the player leading soldiers against Xenomorphs. The game is a real-time tactical action game, and players can customize the abilities, weapons, and other qualities of their soldiers.
You can also forge paths by choosing shortcuts and establishing safe zones in order to defend against the dangerous Xenomorphs.
The game's official marketing material promises plenty of iconic Aliens monsters like Facehuggers and Alien Queens, as well as brand new enemies called rogue human commandos.
Aliens: Dark Descent isn't the only PC game that's available to preorder at a discount from Fanatical. You can also grab Armored Core 6 for more than 10% off. Meanwhile, if you're looking for some bargains you can play now, check out Fanatical's various bundle deals and the Humble Choice lineup for June, which you can get for only $8 with our promo code GAMESPOT8.
Disclaimer: GameSpot and Fanatical are both owned by Fandom.
Best Gaming & Tech Deals This Week


詳細句子文法解析：

1. "Aliens: Dark Descent launches next Tuesday, June 20, and if you're looking for a deal on preorders--Fanatical and Green Man Gaming are offering 18% off the game's PC edition (Steam key). You can preorder a Steam key for Aliens: Dark Descent for $32.79 ($40)."

這是一個複合句，前半部分是主句，後半部分是條件狀語從句。使用if引導條件狀語從句，表示如果符合某一條件，就會得到某種好處。

2. "Aliens: Dark Descent features an original story set in the Aliens franchise, with the player leading soldiers against Xenomorphs."

這是一個複合句，由兩個並列的獨立子句組成。使用with來引導一個描述子句，表示進一步補充前面的主句信息。

3. "The game is a real-time tactical action game, and players can customize the abilities, weapons, and other qualities of their soldiers."

這是一個複合句，由兩個並列的獨立子句組成。使用and來把兩個獨立子句連接起來，表示一種并列的關系。

4. "You can also forge paths by choosing shortcuts and establishing safe zones in order to defend against the dangerous Xenomorphs."

這是一個簡單句。使用also來表示添加和前面路徑沒有任何關系，單獨出現在句子中表示進一步的補充說明。

5. "The game's official marketing material promises plenty of iconic Aliens monsters like Facehuggers and Alien Queens, as well as brand new enemies called rogue human commandos."

這是一個複合句，由兩個並列的獨立子句組成。使用as well as來把兩個獨立子句連接起來，表示添加的進一步說明信息。

6. "Aliens: Dark Descent isn't the only PC game that's available to preorder at a discount from Fanatical. You can also grab Armored Core 6 for more than 10% off."

這是一個複合句，由兩個並列的獨立子句組成。使用that's引導一個從句，說明主句限制的條件。使用also來添加進一步說明信息。

7. "Meanwhile, if you're looking for some bargains you can play now, check out Fanatical's various bundle deals and the Humble Choice lineup for June, which you can get for only $8 with our promo code GAMESPOT8."

這是一個複合句。使用if引導一個條件狀語從句，使用which引導一個非限定性定語從句，對前面deals的進一步描述。

8. "Disclaimer: GameSpot and Fanatical are both owned by Fandom."

這是一個簡單句。使用冒號表示對前一句話進一步的疏析和說明。

9. "Best Gaming & Tech Deals This Week"

這是一個簡單句，表示主題。

單字：

1. launch 發射；開始(v.)

2. preorder 預購(v.)

3. franchise 特權經營權；專賣權(n.)

4. tactical 戰術的；有計畫的(adj.)

5. customize 定制(v.)

6. ability 能力(n.)

7. weapon 武器(n.)

8. establish 建立(v.)

9. defend 防禦(v.)

10. iconic 標誌性的；代表性的(adj.)

單字記法：

1. launch - 音讀「蘭丘」，詞彙聯想：貨運發射台在蘭丘上。

2. preorder - 詞性變化費解？不如記住是「先行預訂」就對了。

3. franchise - 音讀「法蘭西斯」，跟巴黎那個「法國地帶」有關係...（？）

4. tactical - 音讀「塔克妙可」，貼上粉紫色防水標籤，像做運動需要有計劃一樣需要有戰略。

5. customize - 音讀「客製化」，定制屬於你自己的遊戲！

6. ability - 音讀「阿比利」，拆成額二層詞彙變成「阿三比利：你能力3」。

7. weapon - 音讀「雨萬」，形象上像九尾狐的九柄寶劍之一，吐出光芒。

8. establish - 音讀「伊思泰比」，拆成額三層詞彙變成「伊-思-泰比結婚了！」。

9. defend - 音讀「地-逢」，看拼音TSU和動作像機器人企圖防禦。

10. iconic - 音讀「眼底胖了」，像雅緻或定風波的那個胖眼。

相似片語：
1. Dark Descent- 相似片語：Blackout, Deadly Drive, Cold Chaos, Cryptic Caverns。
2. Real-time - 相似片語：Live-action，Direct-to-video，Unscripted Reality TV Show。
3. Customize abilities - 相似片語：Tailor instructions、Cater to demand、Adjust training methods。
4. Establish safe zones - 相似片語：build a safety net.
5. Brand new - 相似片語：Freshly minted, New and Improved。

反義片語：
1. Definitely not - 就是相反，死不瞑目，根本不管用。
2. Not a bit - 一些也不，一點也不，同樣是強調否定。
3. No way - 絕對不可能，決不可能，感嘆反對。
4. Unhelpful - 無用的；無益的，反向描述有用的事物。
5. Doesn't compare - 無法比擬，相比之下，竟然說得遜一些。

日語單字：
1. launch - 打ちあげる
2. preorder - プレオーダーする
3. franchise - フランチャイズ
4. tactical - 戦術的な
5. customize - カスタマイズする
6. ability - 能力
7. weapon - 武器
8. establish - 設立する
9. defend - 防御する
10. iconic - 象徴的な

相似片語：
1. Dark Descent - ダーク降下、ダーク響
2. Real-time - リアルタイム、リアルタイム制作
3. Customize abilities - 能力をカスタマイズする、能力を編集する
4. Establish safe zones - 安全ゾーンを設立する、安全地帯を定める
5. Brand new - ブラン・ニュー、新たな、全く新しい

反義片語：
1. Definitely not - 絶対違う、まったく違う、違うことに決まっている
2. Not a bit - 少しも、全く、微塵も
3. No way - 無理、不可能、まさか
4. Unhelpful - 役に立たない、無力な、無益な
5. Doesn't compare - 比べられない、かけ離れている、比べるにもならない
